<a id="class_OpenXRHapticVibration"></a>

# OpenXRHapticVibration

**Inherits:** [OpenXRHapticBase](class_openxrhapticbase.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Vibration haptic feedback.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This haptic feedback resource makes it possible to define a vibration based haptic feedback pulse that can be triggered through actions in the OpenXR action map.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_OpenXRHapticVibration_property_amplitude"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **amplitude** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_OpenXRHapticVibration_property_amplitude)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_amplitude**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_amplitude**\ (\ )

The amplitude of the pulse between ``0.0`` and ``1.0``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OpenXRHapticVibration_property_duration"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **duration** = `-1` [ðŸ”—](#class_OpenXRHapticVibration_property_duration)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_duration**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_duration**\ (\ )

The duration of the pulse in nanoseconds. Use ``-1`` for a minimum duration pulse for the current XR runtime.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OpenXRHapticVibration_property_frequency"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **frequency** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_OpenXRHapticVibration_property_frequency)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_frequency**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_frequency**\ (\ )

The frequency of the pulse in Hz. ``0.0`` will let the XR runtime chose an optimal frequency for the device used.
